actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend provisions of Title 23, United States Code, relating to commercial vehicle lengths and axle weight loads.

summary.text: Stipulates that Interstate Highway System funds shall only be apportioned to States whose vehicle length limit for tractor trailer or semitrailer combinations on Interstate highways does not include the tractor component of such combination or whose overall length limit exceeds the limit for the trailer or semitrailer component by at least 15 feet.

titles.title: A bill to amend provisions of Title 23, United States Code, relating to commercial vehicle lengths and axle weight loads.
